1.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-search-widget
1.0.1.description:
Adds a Customizable Search Widget for WP-Ecommerce Products to give you more control over how the search box looks on your sidebar.(Tested on WP-Ecommerce 3.6.12 and 3.6.13 !)

*Sorry : I Forgot to say that you need the Gold Cart Extension to use the search function from WP-Ecommerce ! )
